translation.Hello-2: This application was developed with the goal of explaining the main concepts behind how a blockchain works. Check out my article below, interact with the application, view the complete code on GitHub, and feel free to share your thoughts with me on LinkedIn.
translation.UL-1: You can now start interacting with the blockchain!
translation.UL-2: To do this, store something you want to register by filling in the data property with your text.
translation.UL-3: Once stored in the blockchain, this value will be protected and secure.
translation.UL-4: Try modifying a block in the past by changing the data or nonce values.
translation.UL-5: You will see that the hash of this block has been recalculated, invalidating the entire chain.
translation.UL-6: To restore the validity of the chain, click on mine the blocks highlighted in red, following the order from smallest to largest.
